snippet: A French television journalist was killed on Wednesday in the Syrian city of Homs, as two members of the Arab League observer mission in the country termed it a failure.
abstract: A French television journalist was killed on Wednesday in the Syrian city of Homs, as two members of the Arab League observer mission in the country termed it a failure.
lead_paragraph: As my colleague Nada Bakri reports, a French television journalist was killed on Wednesday in the Syrian city of Homs in a rocket attack on a pro-government rally that left at least seven others dead.

headline.main: French Journalist Killed in Syria as Observer Mission Frays

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
